title: n8n security advisory (AV26-091)
description: On February 4, 2026, n8n published security updates to address critical vulnerabilities in the following products:
products: n8n (Merge Node)  versions prior to 1.118.0 and versions prior to 2.4.0
n8n (Git Node)  versions prior to 1.123.10 and versions prior to 2.5.0
n8n (SSH Node)  versions prior to 1.123.12 and versions prior to 2.4.0
n8n (Workflow UI)  versions prior to 1.23.9 and versions prior to 2.2.1
n8n  versions prior to 1.123.17 and versions prior to 2.5.2
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
